invention-noun.title: invention
invention-noun.definition: a new thing or idea that someone has made or thought of.
invention-noun.imageSense: A bright lightbulb appearing above a creative mind, symbolizing a new idea or product coming into existence.
invention-noun.example: The internet was a truly groundbreaking invention that changed how people connect.

flavour-noun.title: flavour
flavour-noun.definition: the distinctive taste of a food or drink.
flavour-noun.imageSense: A swirl of vibrant colors and aromas, representing diverse tastes.
flavour-noun.example: Indian cuisine is known for its rich and complex flavours.

exotic-adjective.title: exotic
exotic-adjective.definition: unusual and exciting because of coming from far away.
exotic-adjective.imageSense: A vibrant, colourful bird from a tropical rainforest, or a unique, never-before-seen flower.
exotic-adjective.example: They visited an exotic island with rare species of plants and animals.
